Nov 13
• Reviewed the feedback form of interns and updated the tracker
• Questionnaires and tags for Niram were made

• Updated the remaining activity definitions of SSMM
• New task was assigned to medical interns regarding activity definitions

• Few calls w Niram coordinator
Next
